channel.title: Posts on Yvan Gauthier
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yvan Gauthier

item.title: a new post
item.description: This is where I ramble a lot. References [1] Y. Gauthier and B. Kaluzny, “Data analytics: The same old next big thing for military OR?” 2018, [Online]. Available: http://www.ismor.com/ismor_archives/35ismor_archive/presentations/18_wednesday/35ismor_gauthier_kaluzny_paper.pdf. [2] Y. Gauthier and J. Adamsson, “Decision support tools for domestic security operations,” Information & Security, vol. 27, no. 1, p. 123, 2011, [Online]. Available: http://dx.doi.org/10.11610/isij.2712. [3] Y. Gauthier, W. Wardrop, A. Price, and A. Lawrence, “The size of MARS: Quantifying requirements for the Royal Navy’s future afloat support fleet,” 2008, [Online].

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
